title: How does WES (Canada) evaluation actually work? - Quora

response.answer_text: Just as an aside, a WES may not be what you need. At my employer, which is the regulator of professional engineers, we do our own academic assessment. We do not accept WES evaluations or even those provided by universities that are otherwise accredited by the national engineering accreditation authority, the CEAB. If you’re looking into applying for any of the many regulated professions, check with them first to determine what their evaluation process is.
Hi, I recently had my transcripts evaluated, you can simply get the a set of original transcripts from the university in a sealed envelope and courier it to WES for evaluation.

Getting your degree evaluation for the Canada immigration is one the primary and essential step and there are lot of confusion after the new rules kicked in for India particularly. I thought of providing a clear information on this using video presentation having step by step guide for Wes process. Check it out if you are looking for new updates and how to Apply for WES How to Apply for WES ECA for Canada: Educational Credential Assessment | Latest Update | Canada PR |

Hi, I don't think you are supposed to send your original academic transcripts to WES for evaluation. You need to go to your university and ask for copies of your transcripts (sealed in University envelope or any other) and send those to WES to evaluate or ask University people to send them to WES. I guess that is what I understand. All the best for your endeavors :-) Cheers
